comments.text:
Okay, so I know that you're looking for the question of life, the universe, 
and everything, but I feel like I should educate everyone on why the answer 
to life is "42." When you separate the digits 4 and 2, then translate them 
into Japanese, they become Shi and Ni  If you combine these, they are 
Shini, meaning Death. Therefore the answer to life is in fact death.

captions.text:
Hey guys! So I woke up to the postman ringing
the doorbell 8 a.m. this morning,
and he presented me with this...
IT'S BACK!!
So the guys at Krave want me to do another challenge.
I'm scared!
What's in the box?
Cereal!
Bowl!
Probably shouldn't do that with the bowl...
Spoon! Ow!
SPOOOOONN
And something soft what is this?!
It's the lion onesie!
Hello old friend!
Oh and some goggles!
Hello Phil! We enjoyed you in your lion suit so much last year  that we brought it back again!
But this year you'll need a friend...
DAN?!
Wassup?!
No! No! No!
Ah come back you don't even know what it is!
Look! Okay it was a year ago I put that thing on!
And my dignity has not recovered yet!
It could be anything though! It could be a chocolate eating contest!
Okay I'm intrigued!
You'll both need to assume your animal personas and meet at the mystery location!
Okay...
Warning you might get wet!
What?!
Phil...
Why are we by a pool?
Okay so what are we doing here?!
It says you need to race across the pool to the Krave on the other side!
That is really far!
It's like a dot!
Oh are we just like swimming in our onesies because I think I could do that!
Pick a side of the mystery box to find out exactly how you'll get there!
Mystery box!
I'm gonna go for A for Amazingphil and B for bad Dan...
Good one!
Here we go!
It's a picture of a boat!
A boat?!
And you get...
Come on! Jet ski! Jet ski!
What is this?!
There's also some cameras in the box as well.
Phil, I have a very ominous feeling about this!
3, 2, 1 Reveal!
Amazing!
Where are your oars?
Do I have spoons for oars?!
What the ever loving fluff are those?!
I think they're called water shoes...
Put your feet in this bit here...
Yeah.
And then you can walk on water like Jesus...
Okay! I'm scared! I'm scared!
You're scared?! You're scared?!
Here I go I'm in the water!
These spoons aren't working very well...
okay it's got off to a bad start
I'm spinning! I'm like Sandra Bullock!
This isn't possible!
Man I'm half way there!
Come on Phil! You got this!
I feel like this isn't a balanced competition...
I'm floating! I'm flying Jack!
I can stand! I can stand!
I'm nearly there!
This is not fair!
Boo you!
Where's he gone?
Hey Phil!
Get off my boat!
I can't see I've got mane in my eyes!
The graceful and majestic lion...
What has he been reduced to...

They didn't specify how I have to
use the water shoes, this is legitimate!
Ahh sweet land!
No! Phil I'm drowning! Phil! Wait I'm drowning!
No! No! Nooo!
why have you forsaken me
Congratulations to me!
That was not at all fair!
No I think I kinda lucked out with the boat tbh...
Yeah... Slightly... Water shoes... No wonder I've never heard of them...
because they don't work!
I'm not even dry yet! My tail is still damp!
Don't grope my tail!
Krave are doing a mates go free offer at the moment where you can use this voucher on the side of the box.
Which will probably look a bit less wet than yours...
Where you can take a friend for free to places like Alton Towers or the London Dungeons...
So it looks like we're going for free!
Really?
Well I am... You have to pay...
Seriously?!
Wow what a perfect end to a perfect day...

On the bright side at least you get to
keep the water shoes!!
I don't want the bleeding water shoes!

thanks for watching if you enjoyed this
video please give it a thumbs up

and you can also click on my face here
to subscribe.
and if you want to subscribe to Dan you can click on his face as well
It's not over yet though Dan...
What?! Why?!
Close your eyes...

you'll forgive me for not wanting to
trust you at all...
No just close your eyes! Open your hands!
What are you doing?!
You're next!

title: Phil the Lion vs. Dan the Dinosaur! - WATER RACE
